Requested Scope of Work:

DOOR WIDENING for bedroom, the current door is 30". Member uses a wc. There's an electrical box that will need to be moved. Please include as much detail and pictures to your estimates.

Total Project Cost:

$965.91

Removal of Existing Door and Frame

Remove existing hinged bedroom door, door frame, and hardware. Prepare the opening for drywall repair and barn door conversion.

$95.00

Drywall Repair and Refinishing

Repair drywall where the previous door frame was removed. Includes patching, sanding, and preparing the surface for paint.

$165.00

Barn Door Installation

Install barn door hardware system and mount the new barn door to ensure smooth and level operation.

$300.00

Barn Door and Hardware Materials

Includes a standard pre-finished barn door and a complete hardware track kit suitable for a bedroom entry.

$290.91

Light Switch Relocation

Relocate the existing light switch to the opposite side of the door opening. Includes labor by a licensed electrician, Romex wire, new electrical box, and wall patching.

$115.00

Acceptance of Proposal

By accepting this proposal, the client (hereinafter referred to as "Client") agrees to the terms and conditions outlined in this proposal for DOOR WIDENING for bedroom, the current door is 30". The Client acknowledges that they have reviewed the scope of work and pricing provided and accepts this proposal as a binding agreement. Any additional work or modifications not covered by this proposal will require a separate agreement and may incur additional charges. This proposal is valid for 30 days from the date of issuance. The commencement of work is subject to the receipt of a signed agreement and any required initial payments as outlined in the payment schedule.
